page.title: 13SHEFFIELD WEDNESDAY
page.content: Wednesday really look after their sponsors. They have three special lounges for the guests of their main sponsors, MHS, another for their match day sponsors & one for the directors. The referee also has a separate room. Nobody can talk to the referee so he has a TV to watch. When he is ready he presses a bell which tells the players to stand in line for him to check their boots. 51000 can watch games at Hillsborough - 25000 sit down, the rest stand. If you pay more you can have a blue seat rather than a white one. The police decide how many people can come to a match according to how much trouble they think there might be. Under the stand there are two gyms, where the public are allowed to play football, tennis, basktball, netball, tri-skating and generally keep fit.
